mapper.insert: insert into question (questionNum, questionCount, questionTitle, questionContent, questionDate, customerID, gradeNum, questionCode, questionError, questionLanguageNum) values (#{questionNum}, #{questionCount}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{questionDate}, #{customerID}, #{gradeNum}, #{questionCode}, #{questionError}, #{questionLanguageNum})
mapper.select: select * from question left join grade on question.customerID = grade.customerID where grade = #{grade} && languageNum = #{languageNum} order by questionCount desc limit 3
